title: Conduct PPE Audit
description: An EHS specialist is conducting a planned audit of a production area to ensure all employees are using the correct Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

tasks.description: Retrieve the PPE requirements for the specified production area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the requirements are: hard hat, safety glasses, steel-toed boots, and chemical-resistant gloves.

tasks.description: Observe employees in the area and note any non-compliance on an audit form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent observes 10 employees and notes one is not wearing safety glasses.

tasks.description: Finalize the audit report and assign a corrective action to the area supervisor to address the finding.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the final audit report and creates a CAPA for the supervisor.
